name: CryptosporidiosisTestsForCryptosporidiumSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Cryptosporidiosis (Tests for Cryptosporidium species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting nucleic acid of Cryptosporidium),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Cryptosporidium probe/non-probe),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
